name: Polo Interregionale Jean Monnet - Pavia
membership: EACEA Network of Jean Monnet Centres of Excellence
goal:
Polo Interregionale Jean Monnet of Pavia, Jean Monnet Centre of Excellence
Goals:
Promotion of Interdisciplinary Studies on EU issues through:
- Promotion of debates and diffusion on information on EU issues.
- Organization of Events, Meetings, Courses.
- Publication Activities: books, study series, newsletter.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: TTIP / Economic and Monetary Union / Neighborhood policy  / Energy policy / higher education / Jean Monnet Action / Defence / Social Market Economy
